io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.tools

Class StaticAnimDataParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.tools.StaticAnimDataParser

  • public class StaticAnimDataParser
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to assist with the parsing of STATIC-type effects. This class allows you to get the color of any panel in the static effect.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StaticAnimDataParser(Effect effect)
      Create a data parser using an effect.
      StaticAnimDataParser(java.lang.String animData)
      Create a data parser using the animation data.
